phases.name: WOOD
phases.qualities: Growth, Planning, Vitality. Morning for spiritual centering, movement, nourishment and planning.

phases.name: FIRE
phases.qualities: Peak energy, expression, focused output. Reserve for deep work and high-priority execution.

phases.name: EARTH
phases.qualities: Stability, nourishment, integration. Zuhr, lunch, light restorative activities.

phases.name: METAL
phases.qualities: Precision, organization, refinement. Admin, review, study and tidying.

phases.name: WATER
phases.qualities: Rest, consolidation, transition. Maghrib & Isha anchored; wind-down and restorative practice.
